com.ephesoft.dcma.da.dao

Interface LockStatusDao

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CacheableDao<LockStatus>, Dao<LockStatus>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LockStatusDaoImpl

    public interface LockStatusDao
extends CacheableDao<LockStatus>
    The LockStatusDao interface provides operations to be performed on LockStatus table like acquire lock, release lock etc. for providing the support for locking mechanism for Ephesoft application feature.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    LockStatus

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acquireLock(LockStatus lockStatus)
      Acquires the lock on the particular application feature.
      java.util.List<LockStatus> getAllFeaturesLockedByUser(java.lang.String userName)
      Returns the list of all the application features which are being locked by the userName passed.
      LockStatus getLockStatus(FeatureName featureName)
      Returns the instance of LockStatus for the given application feature name.
      void releaseAllLocks(java.lang.String userName)
      Releases all the locks from the application features which are being locked by the userName.
      void releaseLock(FeatureName featureName)
      Releases the lock from the particular application feature.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.ephesoft.dcma.core.dao.Dao

        count, countAll, create, evict, get, getAll, merge, remove, removeAll, saveOrUpdate

      • acquireLock

        void acquireLock(LockStatus lockStatus)
        Acquires the lock on the particular application feature.
        Parameters:
        lockStatus - LockStatus The instance of the LockStatus.

      • getLockStatus

        LockStatus getLockStatus(FeatureName featureName)
        Returns the instance of LockStatus for the given application feature name.
        Parameters:
        featureName - FeatureName The name of the feature on which lock is being acquired.
        Returns:
        LockStatus The instance of LockStatus.

      • releaseLock

        void releaseLock(FeatureName featureName)
        Releases the lock from the particular application feature.
        Parameters:
        featureName - FeatureName The name of the feature on which lock is being acquired.

      • releaseAllLocks

        void releaseAllLocks(java.lang.String userName)
        Releases all the locks from the application features which are being locked by the userName.
        Parameters:
        userName - String The name of the user which has taken the lock on the application features.

      • getAllFeaturesLockedByUser

        java.util.List<LockStatus> getAllFeaturesLockedByUser(java.lang.String userName)
        Returns the list of all the application features which are being locked by the userName passed.
        Parameters:
        userName - String The name of the user which has taken the lock on the application features.
        Returns:
        List <{@link LockStatus}> The list the lockstatus object.
